# Question

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.

```julia
using Threads

function pig_latinify(strings::Vector{String})
  threads = Threads.Threads.nthreads()
  chunks = Int(ceil.(threads .|> length(strings) . / threads))
  threads = Threads.@spawn for i in 1:threads
    start = (i - 1) * chunks + 1
    end = min(i * chunks, length(strings))
    pig_strings .+= strings[start:end] |> each_tranform(&pig_latin)
  end

  return pig_strings

end

function pig_latin(word::String)
  if startswith(word, "a" |> "e" |> "i" |> "o" |> "u")
    return word .+ "way"
  else
    return word[2:end] .+ word[1:1] .+ "ay"
  end
end
```
